meanings.definition: A type of sausage made from pork intestines.
meanings.sent1: I tried the andouillettes at the restaurant and they were delicious.
meanings.sent2: The butcher recommended the andouillettes for the barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The andouillettes looked like long, coiled ropes on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sizzling andouillettes filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The andouillettes had a unique texture that I had never experienced before.

meanings.definition: A dish made with andouillettes as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother's andouillettes recipe is a family favorite.
meanings.sent2: The andouillettes stew simmered on the stove, filling the house with a savory smell.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the andouillettes on the floor, much to the dog's delight.
meanings.sent4: The andouillettes dish was a symphony of flavors on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The andouillettes were the star of the dinner party, receiving compliments from all guests.
